misc: Has been working on his mental game a lot
biography: Eero, the pride of Vuosaari Golf Helsinki and younger brother of the esteemed Pasi, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée. Known for his calm demeanor and strategic play, Eero has been a consistent presence in the tournament, and Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his eighth appearance.

While the coveted Hector Trophée has eluded him thus far, Eero's individual brilliance shone brightly when he claimed the Victor Trophy, a testament to his skill and dedication. He is known to be a calculating player.

Off the course, Eero is known for his dedication to self-improvement, spending considerable time working on his mental game. This focus, combined with his natural talent, makes him a formidable competitor and one to watch in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.
